text: 10:16 Matyu 26:26-28; Mak 14:22-24; Luk 22:19-20; Aposel 2:42; 2:46Kavɨn kam Godɨn bizir aghuiba an itima, e a bagha God mɨnabi. E an wainɨn dɨpam apir dughiamɨn an e gamima, e bar moghɨra uari inigha Kraisɨn ghuzimɨn posi. Ezɨ bretɨn e bɨzir kam, e anepir dughiamɨn, an e gamima, e bar moghɨra uari inigha Kraisɨn inivafɨzimɨn posi.
